feature.label: DDD_for_DSL_platform
feature.description: DDD language is a syntax highlighter for the declarative model specification used by DSL Platform. DSL Platform is an Invasive software composition platform based on Domain-Driven Design. It uses DSL model to manage various system components, such as: object-relational database, server side libraries and client side libraries.
